title: Troubleshoot Stadium Access Control
description: A fan's mobile ticket is not scanning correctly at the stadium entrance gate.

tasks.description: Ask the gate attendant for the fan's ticket ID or seat number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the fan's ticket information.

tasks.description: Look up the ticket in the ticketing system to verify it is valid for today's game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the ticket is valid.

tasks.description: Remotely re-issue the ticket's barcode and instruct the fan to refresh their mobile app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a new barcode for the ticket.

tasks.description: Instruct the gate attendant to try scanning the new barcode.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new barcode scans successfully, and the fan is granted entry.
